org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions

Class SyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.SyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IMMUTABLE - The type of immutable data structure.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, IsolationBlade, ImmutableSource<IMMUTABLE>, Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ISMSyncTransaction

    public abstract class SyncTransaction<IMMUTABLE>
extends TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>
    A synchronous operation to be applied to an ImmutableReference. The new immutable reference resulting from the update should be stored in this.immutable.
